thread.title: Gurnee Mills hosts Halloween Boo Bash
thread.title_full: Gurnee Mills hosts Halloween Boo Bash

title: Gurnee Mills hosts Halloween Boo Bash
text: Success - Article sent! close GURNEE -- Kids are invited to attend a Mall-O-Ween event at Gurnee Mills Shopping Center on Oct. 29 to enjoy fun and goodies in a safe environment. The celebration will be from 5-7 p.m. at the mall, 6170 W. Grand Ave., near the Guest Services (near entry E). Events will include crafts, face painting, balloon twisting and a DJ dance party and more. Toy weapons and costumes should be worn only during event hours and masks are allowed only on children 12 years old and younger. The event is free and open to the public. Face Painting will be complimentary for Kidgits members. For more information, contact Cristin Newton, guest service manager, at (847) 263-2406 or cnewton@simon.com. Share this page
